caseTitle: Govt. of the Punjab through Chief Secratery, Lahore, etc v. Ch. Abdul Sattar Hans
tagline: Article 25 of the Constitution is only attracted where there is an apple-to-apple comparison. In the present case, this is not the position because both sets of individuals i.e. Sr. Auditors of the Federal Government (BPS-16) and Dy. Accountants of the Provincial Government (BPS-14) are not equally placed. They are employed by different employers with different financial resources.
